name: I N S E C T S
name_original: I N S E C T S
description: It's 2099, Aliens from outer space have infected earth, They choose their prey silently and work together to take down humanity. In This moment of time countries have come together to save humanity from the depths of hell that it awaits. These Aliens are called "Cascan". it is now your duty to save humanity by recapturing the lost land.
